comment._content:
St Mary's Church on the left (Victoria Square)
perth town hall on the far right.

comment.author: 33364206@N05
comment._content:
image 3 and 4 to right.  Portion of this image appears in Perth and Fremantle Past and Present by Simon J Nevill

The photograph shows Hay Street looking down fro Goderick.  Goverment House can be seen on far right of picture and South Perth across the water late c 1870's.  On far right is Perth Town Hall with Mt Eliza (King's Park) in the background.
